name: ThermalRider
description:
Trijam 79 entry, themes "Anti-Gravity" and "If you play with fire you'll get burned"

This is an infinite runner style game where you control a paper plane with a fireball cannon attached to it. 

Input uses arrows, WASD, and mouse

up/left inputs lean the plane back to brake and slow your descent

down/right inputs lean the plane forward to dive

Click to shoot at fire ball at the mouse pointer

Fly over smoke columns from the fires you set to regain altitude

Avoid obstacles or you won't get very far
